## 科研项目

[**Analysing Financial Report of Bookmakers**](https://github.com/scibrokes/analyse-the-finance-and-stocks-price-of-bookmakers)

-   *分析上市公司的财务报表与股价。*
-   *分析新宝1与新宝2的财务报表。*
-   *欲知更多详情，请点击[此处](https://github.com/scibrokes/analyse-the-finance-and-stocks-price-of-bookmakers)。*

<br>

[**binary.com : Job Application - Quantitative Analyst**](https://github.com/englianhu/binary.com-interview-question)

-   *回测金融投注建模与投注策略。*
-   *回测Arima、平滑模型与各种Garch模型，并且凯利投注模型等等。*
-   *弥补缺失值数据与回测高频率交易。*
-   *欲知更多详情，请点击[此处](https://github.com/englianhu/binary.com-interview-question)。*

<br>

[**Betting Strategy and Model Validation**](https://github.com/Scibrokes/Betting-Strategy-and-Model-Validation)

-   *使用Selenium和Phantomjs软件采集网络足球彩券与赛事数据。*
-   *自然语言分析采集来的足球赛事数据，自动匹配球队队名与对冲基金的注单赛事队名。*
-   *运用不同的凯利标准杠杆投注。*
-   *欲知更多详情，请点击[此处](https://github.com/Scibrokes/Betting-Strategy-and-Model-Validation)。*

<br>

[**Introducing ®Studio Server for Data Scientists**](https://github.com/Scibrokes/setup-rstudio-server)

-   *如何在centOS7操作系统建立自己的RStudio与Shiny应用的教程。*
-   *欲知更多详情，请点击[此处](https://github.com/Scibrokes/setup-rstudio-server)。*

<br>

[**Application of Kelly Criterion model in Sportsbook Investment**](https://github.com/Scibrokes/kelly-criterion)

-   *应用加权对角通膨双变量泊松模型，而足球赛事的数据采集于* **WebDriver Dynamic Webpage Scrapping** *。*
-   *应用凯利标准模型，投注于10家博彩公司的英国2011/12与2012/13赛季的赛事。*
-   *欲知更多详情，请点击[此处](https://github.com/Scibrokes/kelly-criterion)。*

<br>

[**Dixon-Coles1996**](https://github.com/Scibrokes/Dixon-Coles1996)

-   *Dixon & Coles 1996 足球得分建模。*
-   *欲知更多详情，请点击[此处](https://github.com/Scibrokes/Dixon-Coles1996)。*

<br>

[**WebDriver Dynamic Webpage Scrapping**](https://github.com/Scibrokes/WebDriver-DynamicWebpage-Scrapping)

-   *使用RSelenium与Python软件，从[7M](http://odds.7m.hk/en/)和[NowGoal](http://info.nowgoal.com/en/)网站采集博彩公司的赔率数据与赛事比分。*
-   *欲知更多详情，请点击[此处](https://github.com/Scibrokes/WebDriver-DynamicWebpage-Scrapping)。*

<br>

[**Soccer League Web Scraping**](https://github.com/Scibrokes/Soccer-League-Web-Scraping)

-   *采集静态网页足球赛事数据。*
-   *欲知更多详情，请点击[此处](https://github.com/Scibrokes/Soccer-League-Web-Scraping)。*

<br>

[**Odds Modelling and Testing Inefficiency of Sports-Bookmakers**](https://github.com/scibrokes/odds-modelling-and-testing-inefficiency-of-sports-bookmakers)

-   *手动收集[500WAN](http://www.500wan.com)、[BET007](http://www.bet007.com)与[NowGoal](http://info.nowgoal.com/en/)网站的足球赛事比分与29家博彩公司的1x2、亚洲盘、大小盘的赔率，所有数据包括从2006至2011的数据。*
-   *应用加权对角通膨双变量泊松模型，测试投注与回酬。*
-   *欲知更多详情，请点击[此处](https://github.com/scibrokes/odds-modelling-and-testing-inefficiency-of-sports-bookmakers)。*

<br>

[**Apply Poisson regression on sports odds modelling**](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/h3e6gv59onz311j/AAAFcfFOfon-kEhveTzvHGHza?dl=0)

-   *应用单变量泊松模型足球赔率建模。*
-   *欲知更多详情，请点击[Calculator.xls](https://github.com/scibrokes/owner/blob/master/data/Calculator.xls)和[Statistics (ver3).xls](https://github.com/scibrokes/owner/blob/master/data/Statistics%20(ver3).xls)以了解更多科研详情*

## 技能

```{r skill, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE, result = 'asis'}
skill <- data.frame('技能' = c('量化交易', 'R编程语言', '微软办公软件', 'SQL语言', 'Python编程语言', '数据分析', '客服工作', '体育博彩行业', '建立RStudio服务器', '统计学', '数据科学', 'Shiny应用', 'Linux操作系统', 'Web API接口', '量化交易'), '程度' = c(9, 9, 8, 3, 4, 9, 9, 7, 7, 6, 8, 8, 7, 6, 8))

tagList(
  tags$div(align = "center", 
           class = "bg-info", 
           tags$h3(class = "bg-primary", "技能与掌握程度"), 
           tags$h5(align = "center", class = "text-muted", 
                   "技能评估（从新兵1至专业10）")), 
  as.htmlwidget(skill %>% formattable(list(
    Level = color_tile('white', 'darkgoldenrod')
    ))))

skill %>% 
  as_tibble %>% 
  mutate(color_tile('white', 'golden')(`程度`)) %>% 
  kbl('html', caption = '图表 6.1 : 技能与掌握程度', escape = F) %>% 
  kable_styling(
    bootstrap_options = c('striped', 'hover', 'condensed', 'responsive')) %>% 
  scroll_box(height = '400px')
```

<br>

```{r skill2, eval = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
#, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE, result = 'asis'}

skill %>% data.frame %>% 
  recharts::echartR(x= ~技能, y= ~程度, series= ~技能, type='radarfill', 
                    symbolList='none', #palette=c('firebrick1','dodgerblue'), 
                    title='技能评估', subtitle= '(by @englianhu)')

chartJSRadar(skill, main = '技能评估', maxScale = 10, showToolTipLabel=TRUE)
```

## 文书明细

以下乃此文书的文件信息。

- 文集建立日：2015-10-12
- 文集最新更新日：`r today('Asia/Tokyo')`
- `r R.version.string`
- [**rmarkdown**](https://github.com/rstudio/rmarkdown) 程序包版本：`r packageVersion('rmarkdown')`
- 文集版本：0.2.1
- 文集作者：[®γσ, ξηg Lιαη Ημ](https://beta.rstudioconnect.com/content/3091/ryo-eng.html)
- GitHub：[源代码](https://github.com/scibrokes/owner)
- 其它附属信息

```{r info, warning=FALSE, error=TRUE, results='asis'}
suppressMessages(require('formattable', quietly = TRUE))
suppressMessages(require('knitr', quietly = TRUE))
suppressMessages(require('kableExtra', quietly = TRUE))

sys1 <- devtools::session_info()$platform |> 
    unlist() |> 
    {\(.) data.frame(row.names = 1:length(.), 
                     Category = names(.), session_info = .)}()

sys2 <- data.frame(Sys.info()) |> 
    {\(.) data.frame(Category = row.names(.), Sys.info = .[,1])}()

if (nrow(sys1) == 11 & nrow(sys2) == 8) {
  sys2 <- sys2 |> 
    {\(.) rbind(., data.frame(
    Category = c('rmarkdown', 'rsconnect', 'Current time'), 
    Sys.info = c(as.character(getwd()), 
                 as.character(packageVersion('rsconnect')), 
                 paste(as.character(lubridate::now('Asia/Tokyo')), 'JST 🌏'))))}()

} else {
  sys1 <- sys1 |> 
    {\(.) rbind(., data.frame(
      Category = 'Current time', 
      session_info = paste(as.character(lubridate::now('Asia/Tokyo')), 'JST 🌏')))}()
}

sys <- cbind(sys1, sys2) |> 
  {\(.) 
    kbl(., caption = 'Additional session information:')}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    kable_styling(., bootstrap_options = c('striped', 'hover', 'condensed', 'responsive'))}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    row_spec(., 0, background = 'DimGrey', color = 'yellow')}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    column_spec(., 1, background = 'CornflowerBlue', color = 'red')}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    column_spec(., 2, background = 'grey', color = 'black')}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    column_spec(., 3, background = 'CornflowerBlue', color = 'blue')}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    column_spec(., 4, background = 'grey', color = 'white')}() |> 
  {\(.) 
    row_spec(., 11, bold = TRUE, color = 'yellow', background = '#D7261E')}()

rm(sys1, sys2)
sys
```
